snippet.title: Gameplay & Mechanics in Strategic Mind: The Pacific
snippet.description:
#ww2, #strategy, #strategygames, #wargame, #turnbased, #midway, #pearlharbor, #guadalcanal 
Steam store page:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/991810/Strategic_Mind_The_Pacific

In this video, you can see the gameplay of the first operation “The Battle of the Coral Sea” in the new turn-based strategic wargame set in the World War II period - Strategic Mind: The Pacific. 

The game depicts the conflict between the United States of America and the Empire of Japan with a high level of historical accuracy.  You have the opportunity to play as both sides of the conflict thus seeing it from two perspectives. However, in this video, we will be looking at the beginning of the US campaign. 

Now, four months have passed since the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor and the start of the war. The US had time to bring together their forces in the Pacific and get ready to turn the tide of war. 

The newly appointed Commander in Chief US Pacific Fleet Admiral Chester William Nimitz is about to face the first major trial of his strategic prowess. Watch the video to see how the events unfold.

If you like the video make sure to visit our Steam page and enjoy the game yourself:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/991810/Strategic_Mind_The_Pacific

The Early access for Strategic Mind: the Pacific starts on 30 April.
If you are interested in additional information about the game, feel free to follow us:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/StarniGames
Facebook page: https://twitter.com/StarniGames
